entry.title: Saturday: Showers at times heavy. High 14.
entry.summary: Showers at times heavy ending this afternoon then cloudy. Risk of a thunderstorm early this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating near noon. Amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High 14. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Saturday 22 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light after midnight. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Saturday 22 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High 10. POP 40%
